title: EventTracker
description: Location-based event discovery platform with interactive map interface, custom clustering, and real-time filtering using Mapbox GL JS.
details:
Key Features:
• Interactive map with custom clustering
• Real-time filtering by name and category
• Geospatial querying for location-based searches
• Admin dashboard with analytics

title: MySQL Table Viewer
description: Full-stack database visualization tool built with React (Vite), Node.js, and MySQL for real-time database visualization.
details:
Key Features:
• Visualize tables and relationships
• Support for one-to-many and many-to-many
• Split-view for data and structure
• Real-time database updates

title: CasaLink
description: Real estate marketplace application built with React and Firebase V9, enabling users to list and search properties through an interactive platform.
details:
Key Features:
• Google OAuth authentication
• Interactive property maps
• Real-time listing updates
• Advanced search filters

title: Developer Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills
